name: HORSEMEN
description:
/ PROJECT ON HOLD /

-------------------

Asymmetric turn-based strategy game up to 4 players !

The Apocalypse has come, and the Lost Souls are wandering the Earth. Choose one of the Four Horsemen as your avatar and rally as many lost souls as you can to your cause. 

Be fast. Be witty.
For other Horsemen are trying to do the same.

Each Horseman has a gameplay of his own.

WAR loses a token every turn but converts masses at a time.
PESTILENCE uses contagion to convert tokens everywhere he sets hoof.
CONQUEST has the power of the numbers. The more tokens, the more zealous he gets.
FAMINE isolates tokens to take advantage of them.

Originally designed as a tabletop game, Horsemen found its way as a video game for a community-sharing purpose.
